lines: We used to be pretty on and off...
Ever since she and Bella started dating I’ve seen her a lot more!
She’s opened up a lot more from when I first met her.
Means I get to talk with her more too.
There were a lot more similarities between us than I thought!
Love spending time with that gal!

* How do you know her?
* How close are you two?
* Go Back.
